pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Interactive Introduction to Life Data Analysis // An interactive introduction to Life Data Analysis that depends on 'WeibullR' by David Silkworth and Jurgen Symynck (2022) https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=WeibullR, a R package for Weibull Analysis, and 'learnr' by Garrick Aden-Buie et al. (2023) https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=learnr, a framework for building interactive learning modules in R.
